Title: Holidays
Description: SharePoint layout-based application for presenting list of Holidays for the international offices of world-wide company which is based on eSPACE platform.
HomeWiki:
Welcome

eSPACE Holidays is the application to be used within Windows SharePoint Services (WSS) 3.0 (or Sharepoint Server 2007).
It provides user-friendly screen for displaying list of Holidays for international offices of the world-wide company.

This project is started since 25/12/2009 from Russia, Saint-Petersburg.

Installation

Please follow the Installation Guide which is Recommended Download for this project.

Perspective

In general this application represents the part of eSPACE platform which is intended for aggregation several applications within SharePoint. These applications will be created for different purposes which are actual for medium-size company during regular day-to-day business activities.
